Thu Dec 28 03:12:00 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/bin/qrencode /opt/bin//qrencode
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/include/qrencode.h /opt/include//qrencode.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/lib/libqrencode.la /opt/lib//libqrencode.la
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/lib/libqrencode.so.4 /opt/lib//libqrencode.so.4
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/lib/libqrencode.so.4.1.1 /opt/lib//libqrencode.so.4.1.1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/lib/pkgconfig/libqrencode.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/libqrencode.pc
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/lib/libqrencode.so /opt/lib//libqrencode.so
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share//man/man1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/qrencode-4.1.1/share/man/man1/qrencode.1 /opt/share//man/man1/qrencode.1
